Row.Text: +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for each Coast tile worked by this City. This building requires 1 [ICON_RES_ALUMINUM] Aluminum. The City can only have 1 Tile improving Power Plant in it at a time.

The Tidal Plant is a Modern era building that improves the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production of coastal Cities. The City must be next to a Coast, no other Tile improving Power Plant can be present and it requires 1 [ICON_RES_ALUMINUM] Aluminum.

Tidal power is a form of hydropower that converts the energy of tides into useful forms of power, mainly electricity. Although not yet widely used, tidal power has potential for future electricity generation. Tides are more predictable than wind energy and solar power. Among sources of renewable energy, tidal power has traditionally suffered from relatively high cost and limited availability of sites with sufficiently high tidal ranges or flow velocities, thus constricting its total availability.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]--Wikipedia
